name: p8g.js
description: Precessing, also known as p8g, is a general-purpose 2D graphics library
author: Bernhard Fritz <bernhard.e.fritz@gmail.com> (https://github.com/bernhardfritz)

scripts.build: rollup -c && tsc src/p8g.js --declaration --allowJs --emitDeclarationOnly --removeComments && mv src/p8g.d.ts dist/p8g.d.ts
